definitions.definition: To perform the marriage ceremony for; to join in matrimony.
To join or commit to, more or less permanently, as if in marriage.
definitions.example: I'm not wedded to this proposal; suggest an alternative.

definitions.definition: To take to oneself and support; to espouse.
To wager, stake, bet, place a bet, make a wager.
definitions.example: I'd wed my head on that.
